class Coffee_Shop_Management.models.Menu(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This model is representing the menu items.

Parameters:

  • name (str, max length 255.) – The name of the menu item.

  • price (Decimal with max digits 10 and 2 decimal places.) – The price of the menu item.

  • picture (ImageField.) – An image representing the menu item.

Classmethod get_items_by_id:

Get menu items by their IDs.

Classmethod get_all_products:

Get all menu items.

id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

name

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>
order_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

picture

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

price

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

class Coffee_Shop_Management.models.Order(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This model is representing customer orders.

Parameters:

  • items (ForeignKey to Menu.) – The menu item in the order.

  • customer (ForeignKey to User.) – The user who placed the order.

  • quantity (int, default 1.) – The quantity of the menu item in the order.

  • price (Decimal with max digits 10 and 2 decimal places.) – The total price of the order.

  • address (str, max length 50, default blank.) – The delivery address for the order.

  • phone (str, max length 50, default blank.) – The contact phone number for the order.

This function is used to accept an order and calculate earnings for the staff.

  • order_id (int.) – The ID of the order to be accepted.

HttpResponse.
